channel.title: Darwinmcd [Remixers Wanted]
channel.description:
Hello fellow Auxians!
I know my style is not very prevalent in the community, so I‚Äôm looking for remixers out there to put their own interpretation/style on a few of my recent tracks (below):
https://soundcloud.com/darwinmcd/hook https://soundcloud.com/darwinmcd/free-time https://soundcloud.com/darwinmcd/nightfall
Anyone who is interested, please DM me and I‚Äôll send you the project file(s) and you can have at it.
Should be fun, right?
This could be a great opportunity to be heard by ‚Äútens‚Äù of SoundCloud listeners. üòÇüòÇ

item.title: Darwinmcd [Remixers Wanted]
item.dc:creator: darwinmcd
item.description:
For Edge:
OK‚Ä¶you already know how I feel about this one from my PM. I love the slowed down tempo and the arpeggio running throughout. The drum drop at 0:31‚Ä¶SO awesome! Also love the ‚Äúreverse‚Äù piano effect at 1:40. Excellent remix my man!

Liked Ô∏è and reposted!

item.title: Darwinmcd [Remixers Wanted]
item.dc:creator: darwinmcd
item.description:
For Nightfall:
Whoa!! Nice job dude!! Loving your approach to this song and the added instrumentation. The drop at 0:28‚Ä¶SO great! I really dig the sections that start at 0:51 and 2:08. Some great automation going on there! Love it!

Liked Ô∏è and reposted!!
